00026 #include "lpc17xx_adc.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00029 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"

00031 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00037 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS ***********************/
00038 #define MCB_LPC_1768
00039 //#define IAR_LPC_1768
00040 
00041 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00042 #define _ADC_INT                        ADC_ADINTEN2
00043 #define _ADC_CHANNEL            ADC_CHANNEL_2
00044 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00045 #define _ADC_INT                        ADC_ADINTEN5
00046 #define _ADC_CHANNEL            ADC_CHANNEL_5
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00050 uint8_t menu1[] =
00051 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00052 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00053 " ADC demo \n\r"
00054 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00055 "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00056 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00057 " Use ADC with 12-bit resolution rate of 200KHz, read in interrupt mode\n\r"
00058 " To get ADC channel value and display via UART0\n\r"
00059 " Turn the potentiometer to see how ADC value changes\n\r"
00060 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00061 
00062 uint32_t adc_value;
00063 
00064 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTION *************************/
00065 void ADC_IRQHandler(void);
00066 
00067 void print_menu(void);
00068 
00069 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00070 /*********************************************************************/
00075 void ADC_IRQHandler(void)
00076 {
00077         adc_value = 0;
00078 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00079         if (ADC_ChannelGetStatus(LPC_ADC,ADC_CHANNEL_2,ADC_DATA_DONE))
00080         {
00081                 adc_value =  ADC_ChannelGetData(LPC_ADC,ADC_CHANNEL_2);
00082                 NVIC_DisableIRQ(ADC_IRQn);
00083         }
00084 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00085         if (ADC_ChannelGetStatus(LPC_ADC,ADC_CHANNEL_5,ADC_DATA_DONE))
00086         {
00087                 adc_value =  ADC_ChannelGetData(LPC_ADC,ADC_CHANNEL_5);
00088                 NVIC_DisableIRQ(ADC_IRQn);
00089         }
00090 #endif
00091 }
00092 
00093 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00094 /*********************************************************************/
00099 void print_menu(void)
00100 {
00101         _DBG(menu1);
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00106 /*********************************************************************/
00111 int c_entry(void)
00112 {
00113         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00114         uint32_t tmp;
00115 
00116         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00117          * – 115200bps
00118          * – 8 data bit
00119          * – No parity
00120          * – 1 stop bit
00121          * – No flow control
00122          */
00123         debug_frmwrk_init();
00124 
00125         // print welcome screen
00126         print_menu();
00127 
00128         /* Because the potentiometer on different boards (MCB & IAR) connect
00129          * with different ADC channel, so we have to configure correct ADC channel
00130          * on each board respectively.
00131          * If you want to check other ADC channels, you have to wire this ADC pin directly
00132          * to potentiometer pin (please see schematic doc for more reference)
00133          */
00134 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00135         /*
00136          * Init ADC pin connect
00137          * AD0.2 on P0.25
00138          */
00139         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00140         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00141         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00142         PinCfg.Pinnum = 25;
00143         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00144         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00145 #elif defined (IAR_LPC_1768)
00146         /* select P1.31 as AD0.5 */
00147         PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00148         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00149         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00150         PinCfg.Pinnum = 31;
00151         PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00152         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00153 #endif
00154 
00155 
00156         /* Configuration for ADC:
00157          *  select: ADC channel 2 (if using MCB1700 board)
00158          *              ADC channel 5 (if using IAR-LPC1768 board)
00159          *  ADC conversion rate = 200KHz
00160          */
00161         ADC_Init(LPC_ADC, 200000);
00162         ADC_IntConfig(LPC_ADC,_ADC_INT,ENABLE);
00163         ADC_ChannelCmd(LPC_ADC,_ADC_CHANNEL,ENABLE);
00164 
00165         /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00166         NVIC_SetPriority(ADC_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00167 
00168         while(1)
00169         {
00170                 // Start conversion
00171                 ADC_StartCmd(LPC_ADC,ADC_START_NOW);
00172 
00173                 /* Enable ADC in NVIC */
00174                 NVIC_EnableIRQ(ADC_IRQn);
00175 
00176                 //Display the result of conversion on the UART0
00177 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00178                 _DBG("ADC value on channel 2: ");
00179 #elif defined (IAR_LPC_1768)
00180                 _DBG("ADC value on channel 5: ");
00181 #endif
00182                 _DBD32(adc_value);
00183                 _DBG_("");
00184                 for(tmp = 0; tmp < 1000000; tmp++);
00185         }
00186         ADC_DeInit(LPC_ADC);
00187         return (0);
00188 }
00189 
00190 /* Support required entry point for other toolchain */
00191 int main (void)
00192 {
00193         return c_entry();
00194 }
00195 #ifdef  DEBUG
00196 /*******************************************************************************
00197 * @brief                Reports the name of the source file and the source line number
00198 *                               where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.
00199 * @param[in]    file Pointer to the source file name
00200 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00201 * @return               None
00202 *******************************************************************************/
00203 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00204 {
00205         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00206          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00207 
00208         /* Infinite loop */
00209         while(1);
00210 }
00211 #endif

00214  * @}
